alert.note: Alert for Broward; Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 29 at 5:08PM EDT until May 29 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following counties, Broward and Miami-Dade. * WHEN...Until 700 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 507 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to slow moving thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen from the previous thunderstorms early this afternoon. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. during the next couple of hours. If the rainfall amounts increase more than forecast, then a flash flood warning may be needed for this area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Miami Beach, Surfside, Miami Gardens, Hallandale, Weston, North Miami, North Miami Beach, Aventura, Dania Beach, Cooper City, Sunny Isles Beach, West Park, Miramar Parkway And University Drive, Hard Rock Stadium, Royal Palm Ranches and Chambers Estates. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
